about.paragraph1: Everything begins with the privilege of being Brazilian with the strength and resilience of a land defined by contrasts, exuberance, and contradiction. A country that fills the heart with pride because, even in the face of loss and challenge, we always find a way to welcome others. Leaving home is never easy.
about.paragraph2: Through every challenge and lesson, one thing has always stayed with me: love expressed through food. It was in each meal that I learned my mother's quiet strength and boundless care. Food has that power it brings us home, no matter how far we've gone.
about.paragraph3: When I cook, I find joy and purpose. Everything else fades into silence. Cooking is how I turn everyday life into magic it's what brought me out of dark places and back to life.
about.paragraph4: I didn't get here alone. It took many hands, many gestures of kindness, many stories intertwined with mine. That's why I dedicate myself to giving back spreading love and belonging through what I create. I believe simplicity is the essence of happiness, and from it comes my desire to share the warmth of a Brazilian backyard: the flavors, the gatherings, and the quiet beauty of the simple things that make our land so unique.

productDescriptions.fixedMenu.boloGeladoFull: Our Bolo Gelado is a beloved 90's Brazilian classic — a chilled coconut cake that brings back childhood memories. Light, moist, and refreshing, perfect for any day of the week.
productDescriptions.fixedMenu.boloMilhoFull: This creamy corn cake is made with love using traditional Brazilian recipes. Sweet, moist, and comforting — it tastes like home. Perfect with coffee or as an afternoon snack.
productDescriptions.fixedMenu.boloCenouraFull: Traditional Brazilian carrot cake with our signature brigadeiro (chocolate fudge) topping. Super moist and full of flavor, this cake is a staple in every Brazilian household.
productDescriptions.fixedMenu.empadaoFull: Our savory pie comes in three delicious varieties: chicken, mushroom, or ricotta with spinach. Made fresh with a buttery crust and generous filling. Perfect for lunch or dinner.
productDescriptions.fixedMenu.salpicaoFull: Salpicão is a traditional Brazilian chicken salad made with shredded chicken, vegetables, and a creamy dressing. A crowd favorite at parties and family gatherings.
productDescriptions.birthdayCakes.brigadeiroFull: We know how special birthdays are in our culture. This brigadeiro (Brazilian chocolate fudge) birthday cake tastes like home, like a mother's kitchen. Made with vanilla sponge cake. Choose your frosting style (buttercream, brigadeiro ganache, or naked) and optionally add decorative flowers. Simple, elegant design. Order requirement: one week in advance.
productDescriptions.birthdayCakes.pineappleCoconutFull: A tropical celebration cake with pineapple and coconut flavors. Made with vanilla sponge cake. Choose your frosting style (buttercream, brigadeiro ganache, or naked) and optionally add decorative flowers. Simple, elegant design. Order requirement: one week in advance.
productDescriptions.birthdayCakes.doceDeleiteFull: Traditional doce de leite birthday cake with your choice of walnuts or prunes. Made with vanilla sponge cake.
